build.script:
cd mySCdjango
python3 manage.py makemigrations
python3 manage.py migrate

clean.script:
rm Caches/*
rm -r mySCdjango/myspider/migrations/__pycache__
rm mySCdjango/myspider/migrations/*
touch mySCdjango/myspider/migrations/__init__.py
rm yolov5/data/images/*
rm yolov5/runs/detect/exp/*
